Categories.name: BILLS_SUBSCRIPTIONS
Categories.description: Recurring bills like utilities, internet, streaming services.

Categories.name: GROCERIES
Categories.description: Daily food purchases from supermarkets and markets.

Categories.name: EATING_OUT
Categories.description: Meals and drinks at restaurants, cafes, and fast food.

Categories.name: TRANSPORTATION
Categories.description: Daily commute, fuel, public transport, taxis, ride-shares.

Categories.name: CLOTHING
Categories.description: Purchases of clothing, shoes, and accessories.

Categories.name: HEALTH_WELLNESS
Categories.description: Daily medications, vitamins, and personal care items.

Categories.name: SHOPPING
Categories.description: Impulse buys and small retail purchases (excluding clothing).

Categories.name: LEISURE_ENTERTAINMENT
Categories.description: Movies, events, and daily recreational activities.

Categories.name: HOME_MAINTENANCE
Categories.description: Small home repairs, cleaning supplies, and household items.

Categories.name: PERSONAL_CARE
Categories.description: Haircuts, grooming, and other personal care services.

Categories.name: TRAVEL_DAILY
Categories.description: Tolls, parking, and small travel related expenses.

Categories.name: WAGES_INCOME
Categories.description: Income from wages or small business.

Categories.name: TRANSFERS
Categories.description: Financial transfers including bank transfers, donations, savings, and investments.

Categories.name: OTHER
Categories.description: Miscellaneous expenses that don't fit other categories.
